channel.title: 317 Torches with fire log in screen
channel.description: I know this has probably been asked many times, but how do I make the torches have fire? I know you have to do something in the client.java with method51.

item.description:

No affence, and i know this doesnt help none, but i suggest you just change the background so it doesnt have the torches lmaoâ€¦I guess they continue to run throughout the players gameplay and lags the client a bit. Keep them removed
